categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starship classes

nodes.text: The Pelta-class Assault Ship was a variant of the Pelta-class frigate. The Alliance to Restore the Republic used modified Pelta-class Assault Ships during the Galactic Civil War. At one point, a Pelta-class Assault Ship engaged and destroyed an Imperial Navy Raider-class corvette over a terrestrial body, while T-65B X-wing starfighters and TIE/ln space superiority starfighters engaged with each other near them. It was equipped with turbolasers.
The Pelta-class Assault Ship was first mentioned in the 2016 Phoenix Home Expansion Pack, an expansion for the miniatures game Star Wars: Armada by Fantasy Flight Games, on a card of the same name.
